Select your Sales Orders from the list below. You can search for your orders by entering the customer name, order date, order #, affiliate name or status number in the Find text box below and clicking the "Go" button. 20 orders are displayed at a time. Click the "Previous Page" or "Next Page" links to view additional orders. New orders can be added from a specific Customer page.

Billing
UNPAID SALES ORDERS - You can view a list of all unpaid sales orders with an outstanding balance.

MONTHLY RECURRING SALES ORDERS - The system will create monthly recurring sales orders for the next month following the specified billing date. This should only be done once a month. The above Billing Date should be the first date of your billing period (e.g. first day of the month). Recurring orders are designated to be paid internally (see below). A recurring order may also be created from the individual Sales Order page.
Billing Date

INTERNALLY PAID SALES ORDERS - You can view all submitted sales orders that are to be paid internally with payment information previously collected from the customer. These include all monthly recurring orders.
